text: I'd like to create a subset of Users that don't have a login... basically as a way to add a photographer field to photos without having a full blown account associated with that person (since in many cases, they'll never actually log in to the site).
A caveat is that I'd also like to be able to enable an account for them later.
So, I think the question becomes what's the best way to set up a "People" table that ties to the User table without actually extending the User table with UserProfile.
